Translations.Text: ‘‘nannodeya, nanagu nanna hettavarigu visvasigalagi nanna maneyolage bandiruvavarigu ella visvasi purusarigu striyarigu ksameyannu nidu mattu akramigalige vinasada horatu berenannu heccisabeda’’
(dutare,) heliri; nanna balige divya sandesavu bandide. (Adara prakara,) jinn‌gala ondu tandavu idannu (i kur‌anannu) keli, higenditu; ‘‘navu ondu visista kur‌anannu keliruvevu’’
‘‘adu sanmargavannu torisuttade. Navu adaralli nambike ittiruvevu. Navinnu nam'ma odeyana jote yarannu paludararagisalarevu.’’
‘‘Nam'ma odeyana sthana tumba unnatavadudu. Avanu yarannu tanna patni athava putranagisi kondilla’’
‘‘nam'mallina kelavu murkharu allahana kuritu sullugalannu srstisi heluttare’’
‘‘jinn‌galu mattu manavaru allahana kuritu sullu heluvudilla endu navu nambiddevu
‘‘kelavu manavaru jinn‌gala asraya padedudarinda avara (jinn‌gala) bandayavu mattastu heccitu’’
‘‘allahanu yarannu matte jivantagolisalaranendu nivu nambiruvante avaru (a jinn‌galu) nambiddaru’’
‘‘navu akasavannu samiksisi nodidevu. Adannu balistha kavalugararu raksisuttiruvudannu hagu adu benkiyinda tumbiruvudannu kandevu’’
‘‘hinde navu suddi kelalikkagi alli halavede kuruttiddevu. Adare iga, hage kela horatavanu, tanna mele benkiya daliyannu edurisa bekaguttade
‘‘bhuvasigala odeyanu avarige enadaru ahitavannu madabayasuttano athava hitavannu madabayasuttano embudu namage tiliyadu’’
‘‘Nam'malli kelavaru sajjanariddare mattu itara bageyavaru iddare. Nam'malli vibhinna panthagalive’’
‘‘bhumiyalli allahanannu solisalu nam'minda sadhyavilla mattu avaninda tappisikolluva mulaka avanannu manisalikku nam'minda sadhyavilla embudannu navu managandiddeve
